remarks: The negatives of two complex numbers are equal iff they are equal. Deduction form of ~ neg11 .  Generalization of ~ neg11d . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
neg11ad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
neg11ad $p |- ( ph -> ( -u A = -u B <-> A = B ) ) $.
